be.uclouvain.sinf1225.gourmet.utils
Class GourmetDatabase

java.lang.Object
  android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      be.uclouvain.sinf1225.gourmet.utils.GourmetDatabase

public class GourmetDatabase
extends SQLiteOpenHelper

Layer between the models classes and the database. ONLY models should access to this class! NO verification will be done on rights!

Author:
guillaumederval
